review: I have the Fire Stick and I have AppleTV.  The main problems with the Fire Stick as I see them are (1) it's buggy - my stick randomly sticks (not on the remote itself, but on the television) and the cursor flies up and down wildly.  I have given serious consideration to returning it. It is a better value than AppleTV, and when it works, it works okay, but this has been very frustrating for me.  Also, there is no quick way to put it to sleep.  On the AppleTV you hold two buttons on the remote and it turns off.  The stick requires you to go out of whatever you're doing, into the main menu, and then to settings, and then to another menu, merely to put it to sleep.  There should be a faster way to just turn it off.
author: DukeofCs "DukeofCs"
